name: Tankington
description:
Made this for school.

Shoot things with a little tank thing.

Use W/S, Space and Escape to navigate the menu.
Hit M to mute music.
There's a tutorial in-game for shooting stuff.

Controller support, but idk if multiple controllers work in coop.
(Actually all I tested was a Playstation 4 controller so idkkkkkk)

Stuff that's not mine:
- Paper texture (here)
- Music (Wonderfish by Noisemaker)
